name: ProceduresInvolvingContraceptiveDevices
title: Procedures Involving Contraceptive Devices
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent procedures involving contraceptive devices.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with procedures related to contraceptive devices. This is a grouping of CPT, HCPCS and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Diaphragm or cervical cap fitting with instructions
Removal of intrauterine contraceptive device from pouch of Douglas (procedure)
Removal of displaced intrauterine contraceptive device (procedure)
Removal of displaced intrauterine contraceptive device from peritoneal cavity (procedure)
Insertion of subcutaneous contraceptive in arm (procedure)
Removal of etonogestrel radiopaque contraceptive implant (procedure)
Insertion of hormone releasing intrauterine contraceptive device (procedure)
Removal of hormone releasing intrauterine contraceptive device (procedure)
